If you're filing a bug report, please consider including the following information:

* The current treefmt configuration (your `treefmt.toml` file).
* The current treefmt version (`treefmt --version`).
* Your pre-commit configuration (`.pre-commit-config.yaml`).
* A description of your environment (e.g., operating system, Python version, etc.).
